main event: Mrs. Mary Ann Wilson reported seeing a round, metallic unidentified flying object hovering in the sky over Columbus, Ohio, which then accelerated and disappeared from view on 8 November 1961.
interesting points: The object was observed hovering before it suddenly accelerated away,The witness described the object as round and metallic,No other witnesses were reported for this sighting,The investigation concluded the case as unidentified due to insufficient evidence,The witness made a sketch of the object during the sighting.
witness description: Mrs. Mary Ann Wilson, the witness described seeing a hovering object that accelerated rapidly.
